alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Central Greenville; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Greenville, central Spartanburg and northeastern Anderson Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1045 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Spartanburg to 6 miles east of Easley. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Greenville Downtown, Greenville Eastside, Mauldin, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Powdersville, Piedmont, Pacolet and Roebuck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Central Greenville; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
